name: Marie Blogg
text: PME are fantastic – the best we’ve ever dealt with. We had to get through a few issues with NDIS to get my daughters new wheelchair, but once that was sorted the process was made easy by PME. They couldn’t do enough for us.

name: David Morren
text: PME are fantastic – the best we’ve ever dealt with. We had to get through a few issues with NDIS to get my daughters new wheelchair, but once that was sorted the process was made easy by PME. They couldn’t do enough for us.
